tests

Class CallCostCalculatorTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.CallCostCalculatorTests

  • public class CallCostCalculatorTests
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests behaviour of CallCostCalculator in an isolated context.

      void attemptingToCalculateCallCostWithNullParametersThrowsInvalidArgumentException()
      Tests that passing null parameters in to calculateCallCost function throws an InvalidArgumentException.

      Tests that a call which goes into a new year is charged correctly for each tariff type.

      Tests that call which lasts less than a minute but crosses from off-peak to peak period is charged correctly for each tariff type.

      Tests that a call that lasts for a week is charged correctly for each tariff type.

      Tests that call which starts and ends in same off-peak period is charged correctly for each tariff type.

      Tests that a call which starts and ends within same peak period is charged correctly for each tariff type.
      void callThatStartsInOffPeakPeriodAndEndsInPeakPeriodOnSameDayIsChargedCorrectly()
      Tests that call which starts in off-peak period and ends in next peak period is charged correctly for each tariff type.
      void callThatStartsInPeakPeriodAndEndsInOffPeakPeriodOnSameDayIsChargedCorrectly()
      Tests that call which starts in peak period and ends in next off-peak period is charged correctly for each tariff type.
      void callThatStartsInPrePeakPeriodAndEndsInPostPeakPeriodOfNextDayIsChargedCorrectly()
      Tests that a call that starts in pre-peak period and finished in post-peak period the next day is charged correctly for each tariff type.

      Setup which is run before each unit test.
